Class MongoHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • destiny.net.MongoHandler

  • public class MongoHandler
extends Object
    A class that handles all mongo queries for a user

    5/24/21
    Author:
    Nathaniel

      • rollRandomCharacter

        public static org.bson.Document rollRandomCharacter(String userName)
        Rolls a random character from the database and returns their document if you don't already have the character. Otherwise returns null
        Parameters:
        userName - The username of the user you want to roll for
        Returns:
        The document of the character rolled or null if the character has already been obtained

        Parameters:

        stamina - The stamina you want to set for the user
        now - The current date

      • progressLevel

        public static void progressLevel(String userName)
        Unlocks the next level for the given user
        Parameters:
        userName - The username of the player that should have their levels unlocked increased
